title: Spelunky 2 is Getting Incredible Reviews! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.15.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about a shorter supply of PlayStation 5 consoles, Spelunky 2 reviews, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:05:13 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO is getting kicked to Wednesday because we’re reacting live to the PlayStation 5 Showcase at 1pm PT. AND THEN AFTER, our post-show will be a special episode of PS I Love YOU XOXO, breaking down our thoughts on everything we just saw.
Thursday RTX Panels:
Kinda Funny: We Still Need Your Sub More Than Funhaus - Noon Pacific Time
I (Blessing) am on a panel “The Wonderful World of Games Journalism” at 3pm pacific time with What’s Good Games: Andrea Rene and Brittney Brombacher, Easy Allies: Brandon Jones and Daniel Bloodworth and Inside Gaming: Autumn Farrell (Moderator and host)
You can catch those on roosterteeth.com
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock, Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:51 - Sony Reportedly Cuts Launch Window PS5 Production by 4 Million - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:19:20 - Spelunky 2 Review Round Up
00:28:20 - We may have the answer to Immortal Fenyx Rising’s name change - Brendan Sinclair @ GiBiz
00:34:50 - One for me: Undertale creator Toby Fox gives a Deltarune Update - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:38:34 - Out today
00:41:00 -  QUIP 
00:43:00 -  UPSTART 
00:43:40 -  Door Dash 
 Reader mail   -
00:45:05 - Do these two different boxes clearly tell the quote-unquote "uninformed grandma/casual shopper" what exactly their child or relative is asking for? - The Nano Biologist
00:53:26 - Are Sony at risk of repeating themselves with the PS5's games library? - Pinkythebadmonkey
00:57:30 - Squad Up:The Nano Biologist - A Thank You note https://donate.tiltify.com/@thenanobiologist/nanos-microsoft-flight-sim-charity-event
00:58:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Parris Lilly
